name: Crater Defence
description:
Welcome to the Crater, a resource-rich area on planet Gwee. Survive for as long as possible by mining the powerful metal lolonium before the planet's inhabitants kick you out.

Structure information:

  • The Core: The location of your headquarters and the target of the enemy. You must defend this at all costs. All structures must be linked to the core or they will not function.
  • Mines: Can only be placed on ore deposits and generate 5 metal every 10 seconds. Costs 25 metal.
  • Containers: Adds 50 to the max stored metal while connected to the core. Costs 25 metal.
  • Generators: Consumes 2 metal to generate 3 energy every 10 seconds. costs 25 metal.
  • Batteries: Adds 50 to the max stored energy while connected to the core. Costs 25 metal.
  • Turrets: Your only defence against the waves of incoming enemies. Fires 5 bullets per second, with each bullet costing 5 energy. Costs 50 metal.
  • Structures can only be built when the see-through preview is blue.
  • Structures are connected only when the orb above them is green. They will not work if not connected.

Controls:

  • WASD / arrow keys to move around
  • You can also right-click and drag to move around
  • Middle mouse button to rotate around
  • Scroll to zoom in and out
  • Left-Click to select structures and build them
